statements: SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 25;
SELECT first_name, last_name, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, age FROM customer_demographics WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' AND location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customer_demographics WHERE preferences IS NOT NULL ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE location = 'New York' AND age > 25;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY location, first_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, preferences FROM customer_demographics WHERE preferences IS NOT NULL ORDER BY first_name, last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE location LIKE 'New%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, gender FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE is_premium = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, location FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY gender ASC, location DESC;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM CustomerDemographics GROUP BY gender HAVING COUNT(customer_id) > 1;
SELECT customer_id, age, location, is_premium FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE location LIKE '%New York%' AND is_premium = TRUE;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.age, m.menu_item, m.rating, m.feedback FROM CustomerDemographics c JOIN MenuPreferences m ON c.customer_id = m.customer_id WHERE m.rating > 3;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.age, c.location, m.menu_item, m.rating FROM CustomerDemographics c JOIN MenuPreferences m ON c.customer_id = m.customer_id WHERE c.location = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY m.rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, income FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' AND income > 50000;
SELECT menu_id, cuisine_type, price FROM menu_offerings WHERE price < 20.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, favorite_cuisine, dietary_preferences FROM customer_preferences WHERE favorite_cuisine = 'Italian';
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT customer_id, gender, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE income < 50000;
SELECT customer_id, favorite_cuisine, dietary_preferences FROM customer_preferences WHERE preferred_spicy_level >= 3;
SELECT menu_id, cuisine_type, price FROM menu_offerings WHERE price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 20.00 ORDER BY price;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics cd JOIN customer_preferences cp ON cd.customer_id = cp.customer_id WHERE cd.age < 40 AND cp.preferred_drink = 'Coffee';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 18;
SELECT customer_id, name, location FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, favorite_items FROM customer_preferences WHERE LENGTH(favorite_items) > 0;
SELECT * FROM menu_items WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age, location FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;

SELECT menu_items.item_name, menu_items.category, menu_items.price, customer_preferences.favorite_items FROM menu_items JOIN customer_preferences ON menu_items.item_id = customer_preferences.customer_id ORDER BY menu_items.price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM Customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT location FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT item_name, category, price FROM Items WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount < 100 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, age FROM Customers WHERE age > 30
SELECT item_id, item_name, category, price FROM Items ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000
SELECT customer_id, location FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY location
SELECT item_id, item_name, category, price FROM Items WHERE category = 'Electronics'
